channel.title: Can't run server
channel.description: My friend started RuneAge server and when he clicks run.bat he gets an error that says cannot find main class. He is running windows vista 32bit, he has java 1.6.0_21 so I don't know what the problem is; I've also set the environmental variables. Does anyone know what the problem is?

item.title: Can't run server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:8, topic:361220”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=457508.msg3351581#msg3351581 date=1285381556]
If the Java VM can’t find your main class that means you need to compile your files so that a main class is created with all of the other sub classes the run off it.
[/quote]
^

public static void main(String args[]) {

Yes the class that has the mean Method that runs the whole server is the one you need which isn’t found by the Java VM.

Read full topic

item.description:

If the Java VM can’t find your main class that means you need to compile your files so that a main class is created with all of the other sub classes the run off it.

item.title: Can't run server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If the Java VM can’t find your main class that means you need to compile your files so that a main class is created with all of the other sub classes the run off it.

@emtrescue wrote:

er, dont use team viewer. it might be the source or you just need another run.bat for it to work for hes pc or he is using the wrong client/source could be many things… try having him uninstall and reinstall java first but dotn use team viewer ppl get hacked that way
